text: @realDonaldTrump Trump has found his fall guy. Lets have Pence lead the Coronavirus situation He did such a great job with the intravenous HIV problem as Governor. Great medical background, didn't believe all the health issues related to smoking. Trump will throw him under the bus & keep driving

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.
